Shop for over-the-counter medicines, vitamins and supplements, nutrition products, medical supplies, sun protection and more. When it comes to keeping you and your family healthy, turn to Sam's Club. Over-the-Counter Medicines Keep your medicine cabinet stocked with over-the counter meds from Sam's Club. Whether you need headache relief, allergy medicine, cold and cough remedies or digestive aids, you'll find it at Sam's Club. Not only will you find single bottles of over-the-counter medicines but there are value packs of some products as well. Save money and time by shopping for your over-the-counter medicines at Sam's Club. Diet & Nutrition Stock up on protein drinks and nutritional supplements so you can keep feeling good. Buy protein drinks in bulk at Sam's Club. They come in delicious flavors and many of them can be stored at room temperature for convenience. Vitamins & Supplements Make sure your body get the nutrients it needs with vitamins and supplements. You'll find some common vitamins like vitamin C, vitamin D, vitamin E and calcium. Then, there are supplements to support joint health, supplements to support sleep, and even supplements that are geared toward the needs of men and women. Pick up some daily multivitamins, too. Health Services Did you know you can get a free hearing test at participating Sam's Club locations? You'll also find optical services, a pharmacy with members-only savings on prescriptions and accessories to Telehealth by MeMD. These are just a few more ways that Sam's Club can help you stay on top of your family's health needs.
